name.ja: <ruby>威<rt>い</rt></ruby><ruby>迫<rt>はく</rt></ruby><ruby>鉱<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>石<rt>せき</rt></ruby>－サモナイト

text.en:
Target 3 monsters in your GY; choose 1 of them, then your opponent chooses 1 of these effects for you to apply.
● Special Summon the chosen monster.
● Special Summon as many of the targeted monsters as possible, except the chosen monster.
